explains: adj. 城市的，市政的；自治城市的，地方自治的；内政的
wordGroup: municipal facilities 市政工程设施
municipal waste 城市垃圾；城市废物；城市废料
municipal council 市政委员会；市议会

sentences.en: The municipal authorities gave the go-ahead for the march.
sentences.cn: 市政当局批准了此次游行。

sentences.en: The municipal authorities here are preparing for food rationing.
sentences.cn: 此地的市政当局正为食物配给制做准备。

sentences.en: Islanders have campaigned for the abolition of one of the three tiers of municipal power on the island.
sentences.cn: 岛民们已经发起了运动，要废除该岛3级市政权力中的1级。
